name: FRACTURED REALITY - Infinite Worlds, Infinite Possibilities
blurb: Embark on a truly epic Cyberfantasy tale, spanning Multiple Worlds and Dimensions! Fantasy, Sci-fi, Real and Surreal.

rewards.reward: I Want Fractured Worlds! (Approx $15) ============================== A DRM-free digital copy of Fractured Worlds, Episode 1 for the PC, Linux, or Mac! ============================== An exclusive Kickstarter in-game Cape Accessory! ==============================\r\nA digital copy of the game's entire Original Soundtrack, as composed by the masterful Scott Holmes ============================== Beta Access to the game! ============================== Credit as a 'Kickstarter Backer' ==============================\r\n(Add a PDF Game Guide for \u00a35! There's tons of cool stuff in the add-on section)

I Want Fractured Reality and Your Other Games! (Approx $20) ============================== A DRM-free digital copy of Fractured Reality , Episode 1 for the PC, Linux, or Mac! ============================== An exclusive Kickstarter in-game Cape Accessory! ==============================
A digital copy of the game's entire Original Soundtrack, as composed by the masterful Scott Holmes ============================== Beta Access to the game! ============================== Credit as a 'Kickstarter Backer' ============================== You can download the 'Humble Beginnings Bundle' upon the campaign end, featuring three previous SNES-style games, their soundtracks AND their game guides! 
==============================
(Add a PDF Game Guide for £5! There's tons of cool stuff in the add-on section)

I Want to Touch and Feel it! (Approx $45) ============================== A boxed copy of Fractured Reality , Episode 1 for the PC, Linux, or Mac! Housed beautifully in a clear Amaray Blu-ray case ============================== An exclusive Kickstarter in-game Cape Accessory! ==============================
An estimated 3-disk jewel-case copy of the game's entire Original Soundtrack, as composed by the masterful Scott Holmes ==============================
Beta Access to the game! ============================== You can download the 'Humble Beginnings Bundle' upon the campaign end, featuring three previous SNES-style games, their soundtracks AND their game guides! ============================== Credit as a 'Kickstarter Backer' ==============================
(Add a PDF Game Guide for £5! There's tons of cool stuff in the add-on section)

I Want A Ghoul! (Approx $70) ============================== A DRM-free digital copy of Fractured Reality, Episode 1 for the PC, Linux, or Mac! ============================== Select a name and class for an optional 'Ghoul' monster - entities who did not survive the 'Event' and now stalk the Fractures in search of a body to take for their own! ============================== An exclusive Kickstarter in-game Cape Accessory! ============================== A digital copy of the game's entire Original Soundtrack, as composed by the masterful Scott Holmes ============================== Beta Access to the game! ============================== Credit as a 'Kickstarter Backer' ============================== You can download the 'Humble Beginnings Bundle' upon the campaign end, featuring three previous SNES-style games, their soundtracks AND their game guides! ============================== (Add a PDF Game Guide for \u00a35! There's tons of cool stuff in the add-on section)

I Want a Big-Box Edition! (Approx $150) ============================== A big-box copy of Fractured Reality , Episode 1 for the PC, Linux, or Mac! Includes a boxed copy of the Game, 3-disk Soundtrack, Art Book and signed Postcards and your choice of signed A3 posters! ============================== An exclusive Kickstarter in-game Cape Accessory!  ==============================\r\nBeta Access to the game! ============================== Credit as a 'Kickstarter Backer' ============================== You can download the 'Humble Beginnings Bundle' upon the campaign end, featuring three previous SNES-style games, their soundtracks AND their game guides! ==============================\r\n(Add a PDF Game Guide for \u00a35! There's tons of cool stuff in the add-on section)

I Want Direct Input and an NPC! (Approx $400) ============================== You get to join all private Skype conferences, where we discuss the direction of the game, giving you the opportunity for direct input! ============================== Submit a design for an NPC with a lore-friendly quest, and we'll work together to bring it to fruition! ============================== A big-box copy of Fractured Reality , Episode 1 for the PC, Linux, or Mac! Includes a boxed copy of the Game, 3-disk Soundtrack, Art Book and signed Postcards and your choice of signed A3 posters! ============================== An exclusive Kickstarter in-game Cape Accessory! ============================== Beta Access to the game! ============================== Credit as a 'Character & Quest Designer' ============================== You can download the 'Humble Beginnings Bundle' upon the campaign end, featuring three previous SNES-style games, their soundtracks AND their game guides! ==============================

I Want to Design a Legendary Item Set! (Approx $550) ============================== Submit a design for an Armour Set and Accompanying Weapon, and we shall work together to bring it to fruition! ============================== You get to join all private Skype conferences, where we discuss the direction of the game, giving you the opportunity for direct input! ============================== A big-box copy of Fractured Reality, Episode 1 for the PC, Linux, or Mac! Includes a boxed copy of the Game, 3-disk Soundtrack, Art Book and signed Postcards and your choice of signed A3 posters! ============================== An exclusive Kickstarter in-game Cape Accessory! ============================== Beta Access to the game! ============================== Credit as an 'Executive Producer' & 'Creature Creator' ============================== You can download the 'Humble Beginnings Bundle' upon the campaign end, featuring three previous SNES-style games, their soundtracks AND their game guides! ==============================

I Want to Design a Familiar! (Approx $1300) ============================== Submit a design for a Familiar, and we will work together to bring it to fruition! We will also work with you to design the acquisition quest! ============================== A personalised 'Familiar Art Card', featuring artwork of the final version of the Familiar that you design! ============================== You get to join all private Skype conferences, where we discuss the direction of the game, giving you the opportunity for direct input! ============================== A big-box copy of Fractured Reality, Episode 1 for the PC, Linux, or Mac! Includes a boxed copy of the Game, 3-disk Soundtrack, Art Book and signed Postcardsand your choice of signed A3 posters! ============================== An exclusive Kickstarter in-game Cape Accessory! ============================== Beta Access to the game! ============================== Credit as an 'Executive Producer' & 'Character Creator' ============================== You can download the 'Humble Beginnings Bundle' upon the campaign end, featuring three previous SNES-style games, their soundtracks AND their game guides!  ==============================

I Want to Design a Mercenary! (Approx $1300) ============================== Submit a design for a mercenary character, which will be recruitable during the course of the game! We will then work together to bring it to fruition! ============================== A personalised 'Character Art Card', featuring artwork of the final version of the character that you design!  ============================== You get to join all private Skype conferences, where we discuss the direction of the game, giving you the opportunity for direct input! ============================== A big-box copy of Fractured Reality, Episode 1 for the PC, Linux, or Mac! Includes a boxed copy of the Game, 3-disk Soundtrack, Art Book and signed Postcards and your choice of signed A3 posters! ============================== An exclusive Kickstarter in-game Cape Accessory! ============================== Beta Access to the game! ============================== Credit as an 'Executive Producer' & 'Mercenary Creator' ============================== You can download the 'Humble Beginnings Bundle' upon the campaign end, featuring three previous SNES-style games, their soundtracks AND their game guides!  ==============================

I Want to OWN a Piece of the Game! (Approx $1600) ============================== Submit a design for an NPC, and we will work together to bring it to fruition! We will then give that person a property and land within the game world! ============================== A personalised 'Character Art Card', featuring artwork of the final version of the character that you design! ============================== You get to join all private Skype conferences, where we discuss the direction of the game, giving you the opportunity for direct input! ============================== A big-box copy of Fractured Reality, Episode 1 for the PC, Linux, or Mac! Includes a boxed copy of the Game, 3-disk Soundtrack, Art Book and signed Postcards and your choice of signed A3 posters! ============================== An exclusive Kickstarter in-game Cape Accessory! ============================== Beta Access to the game! ============================== Credit as an 'Executive Producer' & 'Character Creator' ============================== You can download the 'Humble Beginnings Bundle' upon the campaign end, featuring three previous SNES-style games, their soundtracks AND their game guides!  ==============================

I Want to Design a Dungeon! (Approx $2000) ============================== Submit a design for a dungeon or area, and we will work together to bring it to fruition! ============================== A personalised 'Dungeon Master' book, which contains everything relating to your dungeon from concept through to implementation! ============================== You get to join all private Skype conferences, where we discuss the direction of the game, giving you the opportunity for direct input! ============================== A big-box copy of Fractured Reality, Episode 1 for the PC, Linux, or Mac! Includes a boxed copy of the Game, 3-disk Soundtrack, Art Book and signed Postcards and your choice of signed A3 posters! ============================== An exclusive Kickstarter in-game Cape Accessory! ============================== Beta Access to the game! ============================== Credit as an 'Executive Producer' & 'Dungeon Designer' ============================== You can download the 'Humble Beginnings Bundle' upon the campaign end, featuring three previous SNES-style games, their soundtracks AND their game guides!  ==============================

I Want to Design a Ton of Stuff! (Approx $3200) ============================== Submit a design for a dungeon, recruitable mercenary character and a unique Familiar, and we will work very closely with you to bring everything to life!  ============================== A personalised 'Design Master' book, which contains everything relating to your designs from concept through to implementation! ============================== You get to join all private Skype conferences, where we discuss the direction of the game, giving you the opportunity for direct input! ============================== A big-box copy of Fractured Reality, Episode 1 for the PC, Linux, or Mac! Includes a boxed copy of the Game, 3-disk Soundtrack, Art Book and signed Postcards and your choice of signed A3 posters! ============================== An exclusive Kickstarter in-game Cape Accessory! ============================== Beta Access to the game! ============================== Credit as an 'Executive Producer', 'Character Creator' & 'Dungeon Designer' ============================== You can download the 'Humble Beginnings Bundle' upon the campaign end, featuring three previous SNES-style games, their soundtracks AND their game guides! ==============================

I Want to Come to London! (Approx $3600) ============================== The personal touch-tier. We'll meet up in London-town for some kind of expo, ideally, grab a few drinks, eat fine food, meet fine people. Stay includes two nights in a hotel, flights not included. Contact us for more information. ============================== You get to join all private Skype conferences, where we discuss the direction of the game, giving you the opportunity for direct input! ============================== A big-box copy of Fractured Reality, Episode 1 for the PC, Linux, or Mac! Includes a boxed copy of the Game, 3-disk Soundtrack, Art Book and signed Postcards and your choice of signed A3 posters! ============================== An exclusive Kickstarter in-game Cape Accessory! ============================== Beta Access to the game! ============================== Credit as an 'Executive Producer', 'Character Creator' & 'Dungeon Designer' ============================== You can download the 'Humble Beginnings Bundle' upon the campaign end, featuring three previous SNES-style games, their soundtracks AND their game guides! ==============================

I Want to Own Something Unique! (Approx $8000) ============================== I will send to you my very own developer's scrapbook/diary. It contains all scribbles, notes, drafts and scraps of paper that I can find, plus disks containing original drafts and works-in-progress. Everything I can find that relates to the Data Hacker & Fractured Reality games! ============================== You get to join all private Skype conferences, where we discuss the direction of the game, giving you the opportunity for direct input! ============================== A big-box copy of Fractured Reality, Episode 1 for the PC, Linux, or Mac! Includes a boxed copy of the Game, 3-disk Soundtrack, Art Book and signed Postcards and your choice of signed A3 posters! ============================== An exclusive Kickstarter in-game Cape Accessory! ============================== Beta Access to the game! ============================== Credit as an 'Arch-Executive Producer' ============================== You can download the 'Humble Beginnings Bundle' upon the campaign end, featuring three previous SNES-style games, their soundtracks AND their game guides!
